nodes.text: Nina Gold served as a UK casting director for the films Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.

Gold is married to Frank Hewetson, a Greenpeace activist who was imprisoned in Russia in 2013 for illegally protesting Russian oil drilling in the Arctic Ocean. The couple have two children, Nell and Joe. Their son, Joe Hewetson, plays a Resistance officer in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
